result.arabic_text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقٗاۚ وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ
result.translation: (13) It is He who shows you His signs and sends down to you from the sky, provision. But none will remember except he who turns back [in repentance].
